item.title: Android Studio 3.3.2: Release Kotlin project to Jcenter
item.description:
Overview

The paper is finally light.

I always thought that publishing AAR to jcenter is very simple, and it should be no different from publishing to a private server nexus. I didnâ€™t expect to know how many pits I had when I did it myself.
